content: tail for sewing pinch the base of the ear together to shape and sew onto the top of the head level with rounds six and seven i like to angle the ears in a v with the front of the ears closer to the sides of the head and the back angling towards the centre please see this tutorial ​https //youtu be/elsiqr79gam ​for help making the ears © laura s pixie patch 4 dutch rabbit the dutch rabbit is very easy to identify with its distinctive colour pattern they are one of the most popular rabbit breeds to make your own mini dutch rabbit you will need to follow the european rabbit pattern for the ears tail and back legs which are all made in the contrast colour in this pattern w stands for white and cc contrast colour head and body round 1 ​ using w make 6 in m r round 2 ​cc single_crochet w single_crochet in same stitch as previous stitch single_crochet cc increase w single_crochet increase cc single_crochet 9 stitches round 3 ​ cc 2sc w single_crochet in same stitch as previous single_crochet single_crochet cc single_crochet increase single_crochet w single_crochet increase cc single_crochet 12 stitches round 4 ​ cc 3sc w 2sc cc single_crochet in same stitch as previous single_crochet 3sc w 3sc cc single_crochet 13 stitches round 5 ​cc 4sc w single_crochet cc 4sc w increase 2sc cc single_crochet in same stitch as previous single_crochet 15 stitches round 6 ​cc 8sc w 2sc increase 2sc increase single_crochet 17 stitches © laura s pixie patch 5 round 7 ​ in w 11sc b s 2sc b s 2sc 17 stitches attach eyes between row 4 and 5 if using round 8 ​ in w 4sc decrease 11sc 16 stitches round 9 ​in w single_crochet around 16 stitches round 10 ​w 11sc cc 5sc 16 stitches continue using row 11-17 of the european rabbit in cc lop eared rabbit make yourself a cute mini or holland lop with this pattern variation you can of course use whatever colour you like but these instructions are to make the bunny with the cream nose in the picture round 1 in cream 6sc in m r round 2 in brown increase single_crochet increase in cream single_crochet increase single_crochet 9 stitches continue in brown using the european rabbit pattern lop ears chain 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook and next 2 chain 4sc in last chain 3sc along back of starting chain fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew ears to top of head level with rounds six and seven with the ear base about two stitches above the eyes weave in ends himalayan one of the oldest breeds of rabbits similar in appearance to the californian rabbit with pink eyes the example has chocolate brown on the face ears legs and tail but these points can also be black lilac or blue head and body round 1 ​in chocolate make 6sc into m r 6 stitches © laura
